item.title: Wearable Learning Platform in the media
item.description:
Several media outlets report on our work on the Wearable Learning Cloud Platform, a platform that K-12 learners can use to design and play math games that help develop computational thinking skills.

  • WPI Press: WPI Researchers Awarded Grant to Help K-12 Students Design Math Games

  • Worcester Business Journal: WPI researchers get $746K to develop math game site
